name: CPInformationItem
desc: A data object that provides content for an information template.

items.name: init(title: String?, detail: String?)
items.desc: Creates an information item with a title and detail text.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The text that the template displays as the item’s title.

items.name: var detail: String?
items.desc: The text that the template displays below or beside the item’s title.
